instructions.ar: انعطف يمين حادا على Shibuya Crossing
instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre ved Shibuya Crossing
instructions.de: Scharf rechts abbiegen an Shibuya Crossing
instructions.en: Turn sharp right at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es: Gira a cerrada a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.es-ES: Al final de la calle gira cerrada a la derecha en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fi: Käänny jyrkästi oikeaan tielle Shibuya Crossing
instructions.fr: Tourner franchement à droite en Shibuya Crossing
instructions.he: פנה חדה ימינה על Shibuya Crossing
instructions.hu: Forduljon be élesen jobbra az Shibuya Crossing
instructions.id: Turn tajam kanan at Shibuya Crossing
instructions.it: Gira a destra al Shibuya Crossing
instructions.my: Shibuya Crossing​ပေါ်သို့ ညာဘက် ထောင့်ချိုးကိုလှည့်ပါ
instructions.nl: Ga scherpe bocht naar rechts bij Shibuya Crossing
instructions.no: Sving skarp høyre i Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pl: Skręć ostro w prawo na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-BR: Vire fechada à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à direita em Shibuya Crossing
instructions.ro: Virați puternic dreapta la Shibuya Crossing
instructions.sl: Zavijte ostro desno na Shibuya Crossing
instructions.tr: Shibuya Crossing konumunda keskin sağ tarafa dönün
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко праворуч на Shibuya Crossing
instructions.vi: Quẹo phải gắt ở Shibuya Crossing
instructions.yo: Tan-an didasilẹ ọtun ni Shibuya Crossing
instructions.zh-Hans: Turn 急向右 at Shibuya Crossing
